personas.English Language Expert: A person who is fluent in English and has extensive knowledge of grammar, vocabulary, and sentence structure.
personas.Rugby Fan: A person who follows rugby and has knowledge of teams, players, and competitions.

input: The 24-year-old spent six seasons with the north London side and has previously spent time playing in the second tier with Bedford Blues. The Exiles have not disclosed the length of the former England under-20 international's contract. "Ben is a great acquisition," director of rugby Nick Kennedy said. "He has Championship experience which will be very useful as we gear up for what will be a very competitive campaign."
answer: I suggest adopting this alternative solution.

Ben was signed by the Exiles from London Irish after spending six seasons with them and having played in the second tier with Bedford Blues. His contract length hasn't been disclosed. Director of Rugby Nick Kennedy believes that Ben's Championship experience will be valuable in their upcoming season.
